import React from 'react'; // get the React object from the react module import './feed.css'; import SliderPage from './slider'; class Feed extends React.Component { render() { return(

1 Punctuality in the Class

2. Regularity in taking Classes

3. Student's attendance/presence in the class of teacher who is being evaluated

4. Completes syllabus of the course as per teaching plan

5. Scheduled organization of assignments, class, test, quizzes and seminars

6. Makes alternate arrangement of class in his/her absence

7. Focus on Syllabi

8. Self-confidence

9. Communication skills

10. Conducting classroom discussions

11. Teaching the subject matter

12. Skill of linking subject to life experience & creating intrest in the subject

13. Reference to latest developments in the field

14.Uses of teaching aids (OHP/Blackboard//PPT's)

15. Blackboard/Whiteboard work in terms of legibility, visibility and structure

16. Uses of innovation teaching methods

17. Shares the answers of class tests or sessional test questions

18. Shows the evaluated answer books of class tests to the students

); } } export default Feed;
